A focused course on Rt estimation and nowcasting methods originally developed by the [nfidd](https://nfidd.github.io/nfidd) team, adapted for [SISMID](https://sismid.sph.emory.edu/), and further refined for EMBL-EBI.

We invite anyone to use the materials here in their own teaching and learning. For questions and discussion of the course or its content, we welcome all users to the [Discussion board](https://github.com/nfidd/EMBL-EBI/discussions). We welcome all forms of [contributions, additions and suggestions](https://github.com/nfidd/EMBL-EBI/issues) for improving the materials.
